Review: Gene Review: ALS2-Related Disorders  - Genetic Testing Registry: Juvenile primary lateral sclerosis   These resources from MedlinePlus offer information about the diagnosis and management of various health conditions:  - Diagnostic Tests  - Drug Therapy  - Surgery and Rehabilitation  - Genetic Counseling   - Palliative Care,GHR,juvenile primary lateral sclerosis
What is (are) spinal muscular atrophy ?,"Spinal muscular atrophy is a genetic disorder that affects the control of muscle move
